markdownRemark.excerpt: I wanted to try posting gists as a test. It seems to work fairly well, but for some reason I was having problems with it not finding it resulting in a 301 error…
markdownRemark.html:
I wanted to try posting gists as a test. It seems to work fairly well, but for some reason I was having problems with it not finding it resulting in a 301 error.

Here’s a codeblock example:

puts "Hi!" unless sad
